name: Xeno-Flux
description:
Xeno-Flux is a sci fi bullet hell shoot-em-up with an interesting twist. Play as ‘Xubon,’ a powerful alien prince who must save his home planet from other extraterrestrial invaders. Fight hordes of unique alien enemies, grand bosses and acquire new weapons and power ups throughout your perilous journey.

FEATURES

Tube shooting action

4 alien enemy factions

4 alien enemy bosses

3 weapons each with their own secondary fire

Player teleportation

Unforgiving difficulty

PRESS KIT

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1B8uh4Fo6_2ANEC9kxajy8x2UcqqFOdka/view?usp=shari...
